A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I was concerned with all the low reviews on this film.  What did they do?  I am 44 years old and grew up with the franchise.   I loved The Force Awakens and Rogue One.

In fact i loved the brave approachbtheybhave been taking\, not afraid to kill off the leads.

I have been reading some if the complaints and feel most of those people just need a safe place to hide.

The visuals were terrific.  The story line took a great turn.   I won't spoil too much here\, but save it for discussions.  But the director has insured that the storyline can now love on from the past.
